messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Remember, where there's smoke. THERE'S FIRE. Also news there too

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Bumps (Co-Captain)
messages.body:
The gay duo battling out to see who is gayer.

As seen in the picture below, two gay crew members are fighting too see who is the ultimate gay. It turns out Beau is the gayest of them all as he managed to win by pushing over the HOS. Wow what a massive gay
